content.rendered:
Directed by Karan Malhotra

Written by Khila Bisht. Karan Malhotra. Piyush Mishra. Neelesh Misra. Ekta Pathak Malhotra

Star Ranbir Kapoor (Shamshera / Bali). Sanjay Dutt (Daroga Shuddh Singh). Vaani Kapoor (Sona). Saurabh Shukla (Doodh Singh). Ronit Roy (Pir Baba)

Language Hindi

Producers Aditya Chopra. Sudhanshu Kumar

Production Yash Raj Films
